manifest.name: Detective Agency Pack
manifest.author: Donegeon Team
manifest.description: Solve mysteries and uncover clues with this detective-themed quest pack.

quests.title: The Case of the Missing Sock
quests.description: Find a matching pair for a lone sock in the laundry.

quests.title: Gather Fingerprints
quests.description: Help dust a room for fingerprints (as part of cleaning).

quests.title: Interview a Witness
quests.description: Ask a family member three questions about their day and listen carefully.

quests.title: Follow the Clues
quests.description: Solve a riddle or puzzle set by a family member.

quests.title: Stakeout
quests.description: Quietly read or draw for 15 minutes without interrupting anyone.

quests.title: File the Case Report
quests.description: Write a short summary of a book you read or a show you watched.

markets.title: The Sleuth's Supplies
markets.description: Gear and gadgets for the modern detective.

gameAssets.name: Trench Coat
gameAssets.description: A classic detective's trench coat for your avatar.

gameAssets.name: Magnifying Glass
gameAssets.description: A tool of the trade for any great detective avatar.

gameAssets.name: Mystery Novel
gameAssets.description: A real-world reward: a new mystery book.

trophies.name: Master Sleuth
trophies.description: Solve your first major case (or complete 5 detective quests).
